course.title: ADM 2342 Intermediate Accounting I (3 units)
course.desc: This course extends, at a more advanced level, the material covered in ADM 1340. Concepts and procedures, including current and proposed accounting practices, are studied within the context of specific balance sheet and income statement items with specific emphasis on the assets of an organization. In conjunction with ADM 3340, it enhances the student's understanding of accounting practices and financial reporting.Course Component: Discussion Group, LecturePrerequisite: ADM 1340. ADM 2350 is corequisite to ADM 2342.
